long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is changing your "New Tab" page with a clean and beautiful background image with  random quote from some of the best games and the character that uses it. On every new tab, the item picks a different image and quote and displays them nicely to you. This extension is excellent if you are keen into games and will save you from the boring "New Tab". Enjoy!
